Texts.Chs: 把^green;炼金台^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Chemlab^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 化学是一门可让您创造各种有用的东西的学科。制作一张^orange;炼金台^reset;，然后试着用用它。你需要^orange;研究^reset;^orange;化学^reset;科学。
Texts.Eng: Chemistry is a science that will allow you to create all sorts of useful things. Build an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; to give it a shot. You'll need to ^orange;Research^reset; the ^orange;Chemistry^reset; sciences.

Texts.Chs: 干得好。现在，你需要在自己的基地里腾出一点位置了。
Texts.Eng: Nicely done. Now you'll need to find some space for this in your own base.
